bio.desc: Successor to the Divine Dragon, awoken from a long sleep. Summons Emblems to lead the world to peace.
A Steward of the Dragon, long in the service of the Divine Dragon. He is a straight-laced, rigid gentleman.
An apprentice Steward of the Dragon and the gentle twin brother of Framme.
An apprentice Steward of the Dragon and the determined, buoyant twin sister of Clanne.
The staunch and loyal crown prince of Firene. He trains constantly to strengthen his constitution.
Prince Alfred's retainer. A haughty woman with a love for building muscle.
Prince Alfred's retainer. A tender- hearted man whose powerful build comes naturally.
The princess of Firene. Despite her gentle demeanor, she has an iron will when her people must be protected.
Princess Céline's retainer. A woman of noble birth who loves fairy tales and sampling folk food.
Princess Céline's retainer. A smiling, refined gentleman who loves tea.
A thief encountered in a mountain settlement. She keeps a tight lid on the details of her past.
The self-torturing, wildly imaginative prince of Brodia. Has hidden talents even he isn't aware of.
Prince Alcryst's retainer. Despite her fierce demeanor, she's a noble who cares deeply for her friends.
Prince Alcryst's retainer. Her quiet modesty belies her superhuman strength.
The majestic crown prince of Brodia. His people trust him greatly for his strong, genuine demeanor.
Prince Diamant's retainer. Has a boundless enthusiasm for legends and adventure.
Prince Diamant's retainer. A warrior of few words who always keeps her wits about her.
The mysterious, melancholy crown princess of Elusia. She never relaxes her icy royal decorum.
Princess Ivy's retainer. A handsome young man from outside Elusia who speaks freely and without inhibition.
Princess Ivy's retainer. An enigmatic man who's always absorbed in intrigues of his own making.
A freewheeling, optimistic young Sentinel. He's easygoing, but there's something mysterious about him.
A member of the Sentinels. Though deeply religious, he loves to party more than just about anyone.
A member of the Sentinels, and a chef with incredibly refined senses of taste and smell.
The bubbly and outgoing crown princess of Solm. Known for being accessible and approachable by all.
Princess Timerra's retainer. She has a tendency to speak in erratic and somewhat stilted tones.
Princess Timerra's retainer. She's a dashing woman with a fondness for animals.
A mischievous, spoiled princess of Elusia. She is nonetheless devoted to her family and friends.
A famous dancer of Solm. He is also a skilled fortune-teller and cultivates an aura of mystery.
Princess Hortensia's retainer. He loves cute things and always maintains a bright, positive attitude.
Princess Hortensia's retainer. She seems demure on the surface, but is conceited to the core.
A scholar from Elusia. Has a great hunger for knowledge, which he feeds with studies and experiments.
A warrior from Brodia. She is a dauntless and determined seeker of truth.
The younger sister of Alear. Her darkness conquered, she fights for peace.
Formerly one of the Four Hounds. He is Veyle's knight, and has sworn to fight alongside Alear.
A traveling merchant from a wintry part of Elusia. She is a cheerful and cunning cheapskate.
A doctor's son from Firene who works his hardest to save all the lives he can.
